author: chabotc
msg: Fixes up the activities path parsing, was missing the appId param

author: rfeng
msg: Add a new option "ttl" to control when to stop the node

author: mmartinec
msg: Util::helper_app_pipe_open_unix: flush stdout and stderr before
forking, otherwise an error reported by exec (such as 'insecure
dependency') was lost in a buffer;  also, change last-resort
subprocess exit code from 1 to 6 to make it less likely to be
confused with some regular external program exit status

author: cziegeler
msg: Correctly handle shutdown of job queue
